== Tomcat as HTTP Server
contains also a HTTP connector which can be used to serve static HTML pages. The standard directory which will be served is below the Tomcat
`webapps/ROOT` below the installation directory. Place static content into this directory.
To allow directory browsing via Apache Tomcat change the `listings` parameter in the file `conf/web.xml` from false to true.
